instruction: In this task, you will be given a short story. One sentence from the story is chosen. Consider the likely emotions and basic human drives of the participants in that sentence. There will always be some motivation in the given story.

 selected sentence: Todd went riding on his bike.
output: Todd want(s) enjoyment >Motivates> Todd rides his bike
